template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - あなたのリスティングに関する質問があります
template.s_description:
Hi {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) left you a message about your listing {ITEM_TITLE}:

{COMMENT}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} アカウントを認証してください
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

Please validate your registration by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Thank you!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 登録が完了しました！
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

You've successfully registered for {WEB_LINK}.

Thank you!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} で発見したことを見てください
template.s_description:
Hi {FRIEND_NAME},

Your friend {USER_NAME} wants to share this listing with you {ITEM_TITLE}.

Message:

{COMMENT}

Regards,

{WEB_TITLE}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 過去1時間以内の新規リスト
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

New listings have been published in the last hour. Take a look at them:

{ADS}

-------------

To unsubscribe from this alert, click on: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 最終日に新しい一覧
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

New listings have been published in the last day. Take a look at them:

{ADS}

-------------

To unsubscribe from this alert, click on: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 先週の新規リスト
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

New listings have been published in the last week. Take a look at them:

{ADS}

-------------

To unsubscribe from this alert, click on: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 新しい一覧
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

A new listing has been published, check it out!

{ADS}

-------------

To unsubscribe from this alert, click on: {UNSUB_LINK}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 新しいコメント
template.s_description:
Someone commented on the listing {ITEM_TITLE}.

Commenter: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Commenter's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - {ITEM_TITLE} のオプションを編集
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

You're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, but you can still edit or delete the listing {ITEM_TITLE} for a short period of time.

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

If you register as a user, you will have full access to editing options.

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - リスティングを検証する
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this email.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 新しい商品が公開されました
template.s_description:
Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a listing has been published at {WEB_LINK}.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact email: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

You can edit this listing by clicking on the following link: {EDIT_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - パスワードを回復する
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

We've sent you this e-mail because you've requested a password reminder. Follow this link to recover it: {PASSWORD_LINK}

The link will be deactivated in 24 hours.

If you didn't request a password reminder, please ignore this message. This request was made from IP {IP_ADDRESS} on {DATE_TIME}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - メールアドレスの変更をリクエストしました
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME}

You're receiving this e-mail because you requested an e-mail change. Please confirm this new e-mail address by clicking on the following validation link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 警告を確認してください
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

Please validate your alert registration by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}

Thank you!

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - あなたのコメントが承認されました
template.s_description:
Hi {COMMENT_AUTHOR},

Your comment on {ITEM_TITLE} has been approved.

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - リスティングを検証する
template.s_description:
Hi {USER_NAME},

You're receiving this e-mail because you\’ve published a listing at {WEB_LINK}. Please validate this listing by clicking on the following link: {VALIDATION_LINK}. If you didn't publish this listing, please ignore this e-mail.

Listing details:

Contact name: {USER_NAME}
Contact e-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

{ITEM_DESCRIPTION}

Url: {ITEM_URL}

Even if you're not registered at {WEB_LINK}, you can still edit or delete your listing:

You can edit your listing by following this link: {EDIT_LINK}

You can delete your listing by following this link: {DELETE_LINK}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 新しいユーザーが登録されました
template.s_description:
Dear {WEB_TITLE} admin,

You're receiving this email because a new user has been created at {WEB_LINK}.

User details:

Name: {USER_NAME}
E-mail: {USER_EMAIL}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - あなたに質問があります
template.s_description:
Hi {CONTACT_NAME}!

{USER_NAME} ({USER_EMAIL}, {USER_PHONE}) left you a message:

{COMMENT}

Regards,

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 誰かがあなたのリスティングにコメントしました
template.s_description:
There's a new comment on the listing: {ITEM_TITLE}.

Author: {COMMENT_AUTHOR}
Author's email: {COMMENT_EMAIL}
Title: {COMMENT_TITLE}
Comment: {COMMENT_TEXT}

{WEB_LINK}

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - 管理者アカウントの作成に成功！
template.s_description:
Hi {ADMIN_NAME},

The admin of {WEB_LINK} has created an account for you,

  • Username: {USERNAME}
  • Password: {PASSWORD}

You can access the admin panel here {WEB_ADMIN_LINK}.

Thank you!

Regards,

template.s_title: {WEB_TITLE} - あなたの広告はもうすぐ期限切れです
template.s_description:
こんにちは {USER_NAME}、

あなたのリスティング {ITEM_TITLE} は {WEB_LINK} で期限切れになります。
